name: Black-Crops
description:
In the high-stakes world of tactical agriculture, do you have what it takes to lead your Special Croperators to victory?

Make strategic decisions by moving your Croperators around the field. Use their unique actions to plant, water and harvest crops.

Remember, you're on a deadline, and if you can't harvest enough crops before the mission timeline is up, you're out of the game.

Stay ahead of the ever-increasing challenge as you fight to survive the season!

HELP

  • Click on the Croperators to select them, and click them again to toggle between move and action modes.
  • In move mode:
    • Hover over a highlighted space to see your path.
    • Click on a space to move there.
  • In action mode:
    • Hover over a highlighted space to see what action will be performed
    • Click on that space to perform that action
  • Be careful not to step on plants!

Ludum Dare 41 Theme: 2 Incompatible Genres

Tactical Strategy & Farming Simulation
